headline: Why Warren Buffett Bought A $550 Million Stake In 'Unbelievably Good' Opportunities Domino's And Pool Corp
summary: Warren Buffett, the Oracle of Omaha, is at it again. He's proved he knows how to spot a great opportunity when he sees one. In his latest move, Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway invested heavily in two surprising yet strategic companies. What are they? None other than Domino’s Pizza and Pool Corp.
